title: 04/12: PPR Mock Draft Review Part One (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
On today's show we'll take a broader look at the draft with some trends and PPR strategies (6:48). Much of your strategy will depend on what you do at TE ... We each give our two favorite (17:25) and two least-favorite picks (29:30). We discuss the GB and SF RBs, Andrew Luck, Tarik Cohen, Dante Pettis, DeSean Jackson and several others ... Getting into the first three rounds of the draft (36:05). Discussing Todd Gurley, lots of Chiefs, Robert Woods, George Kittle etc. ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Our first look at our 12-team PPR mock draft. We discuss TE strategy, best and worst picks, the Todd Gurley conundrum and more.
